property.name: eqtypId
property.meta: equipment type code (ISO or other). Must be unique within reference set.

property.name: eqtypDataSource
property.meta: Source of this equip type record

property.name: eqtypIsDeprecated
property.meta: if TRUE this instance is no longer to be used.

property.name: eqtypIsArchetype
property.meta: TRUE if set this equipment type can be a supertype (archetype).

many-to-one.name: eqtypArchetype
many-to-one.meta: archetype for this type: refers to another member of this class. If points to self or null, this is its own archetype.

many-to-one.name: eqtypCloneSource
many-to-one.meta: Source instance from which this entry was cloned. Null if subsequently modified.

property.name: eqtypClass
property.meta: The class of Equipment: Container, Chassis, Semitrailer, Mafi, Genset, Accessory, BombCart, SwapBody, Other.

property.name: eqtypTareWeightKg
property.meta: The default tare weight for this class (to be overridden by Equipment instance)

property.name: eqtypSafeWeightKg
property.meta: The default safe weight for this class (to be overridden by Equipment instance)

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.Equipment
class.meta:
Domain entity representing transporation equipment (containers, chassis, etc.)
Some notes on Equipment ownership:
1) Sometimes you know the owner and sometimes you don't (eqOwner field may be null) 2) You always know the eqOperator.
When it is important to know the owner, the depot operator knows it since that is the party that brings the equipment into the depot yard. This is the case when you know that both the equipment operator and the equipment lessee are one and the same. Typically brought in as an off-hire.
We also keep track of the previous lessee (the equipment operator that used it last) as eqPreviousOperator.

property.name: eqIdNoCheckDigit
property.meta: The equipment Id without check digits: this is THE natural key for the entity

property.name: eqIdNbrOnly
property.meta: The equipment Id numeric portion only

property.name: eqIdCheckDigit
property.meta: The equipment Id check digit -last digit of equipment Id full

property.name: eqIdFull
property.meta: The equipment Id complete with prefix, numeric part and check digit

property.name: eqClass
property.meta: The class of Equipment: Container, Chassis, Semitrailer, Mafi, Accessory, Other.

many-to-one.name: eqObsoleteOwner
many-to-one.meta: Deprecated as of 2007-08-22 v1.4.I JJS ARGO-8017: The ultimate owner of the equipment

many-to-one.name: eqObsoleteOperator
many-to-one.meta: Deprecated as of 2007-08-22 v1.4.I JJS ARGO-8017: The lessee, or if not leased but in use by the owner, the owner

many-to-one.name: eqObsoletePreviousOperator
many-to-one.meta: Deprecated as of 2007-08-22 v1.4.I JJS ARGO-8017: The operator who used this equipment last (useful if damages are found)

property.name: eqLeaseExpiration
property.meta: Date the lease expires, null if no lease

property.name: eqBuildDate
property.meta: The date the Equipment was built / put in service

property.name: eqIsInsulated
property.meta: TRUE if the equipment in insulated

property.name: eqMaterial
property.meta: Material of which the equipment is built

property.name: eqCscExpiration
property.meta: CSC Expiration Date (values can be ACEP, NONE, MMYY)

property.name: eqIsVented
property.meta: TRUE if the equipment is vented ??needed?? or by equipType?

property.name: eqLicenseState
property.meta: The State of the chassis license (CA, NJ, etc)

property.name: eqFedInspectExp
property.meta: The date the federal inspection expires

property.name: eqStateInspectExp
property.meta: The date the state inspection expires

property.name: eqAxleCount
property.meta: The date the state inspection expires

subclass.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.Semitrailer
subclass.meta: Defines a Semitrailer (the rear part of a tractor-trailer rig)

property.name: eqSemiAxleCount
property.meta: The date the state inspection expires

property.name: eqSemiDoorkKind
property.meta: The date the state inspection expires

property.name: eqSemiCanTowDolly
property.meta: TRUE if it can tow a dolly

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.UnLocCode
class.meta: Domain entity representing Location Data with coordinates,function,subdivision ,status,etc

property.name: unlocId
property.meta: Location Code for a Location in LocationData

property.name: unlocIsPort
property.meta: Whether the place is a port

property.name: unlocIsRailTerminal
property.meta: Whether the place is a Rail Terminal

property.name: unlocIsRoadTerminal
property.meta: Whether the place is a Road Terminal

property.name: unlocIsAirport
property.meta: Whether the place is an AirPort

property.name: unlocIsMultimodal
property.meta: Whether the place is a Multi Modal

property.name: unlocIsFixedTransport
property.meta: Whether the place is a Fixed Transport

property.name: unlocIsBorderCrossing
property.meta: Whether the place is a Border Crossing rp

property.name: unlocIsFunctionUnknown
property.meta: Whether the place Function is unknown

property.name: unlocStatus
property.meta: The status about the location data

property.name: unlocSubDiv
property.meta: The subdivision code for the location in which it comes under

property.name: unlocLatNorS
property.meta: whether the location is latitude North or South

property.name: unlocLongEorW
property.meta: whether the location is latitude East or West

property.name: unlocRemarks
property.meta: The remarks about the location data

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.Commodity
class.meta: Domain entity representing Commodities with their behavioural nature and properties as min and max temperature,type of commodity

property.name: cmdyShortName
property.meta: The Short name for the Commodity

property.name: cmdyIsFood
property.meta: Whether the commodity is a Food

property.name: cmdyIsFilm
property.meta: Whether the commodity is a Film

property.name: cmdyIsExclusiveReeferTower
property.meta: Whether the commodity is an ExclusiveReeferTower

property.name: cmdyIsNonReefer
property.meta: Whether the commodity is for a non-reefer

property.name: cmdyTempValidated
property.meta: Whether the commodity temperature has to be validated

property.name: cmdyTempRangeValidated
property.meta: Whether the commodity temperature range low and high, has to be validated

property.name: cmdyIsValuables
property.meta: Whether the commodity is a Valuable

property.name: cmdyIsHeatSensitive
property.meta: Whether the commodity is a Heat Sensitive

property.name: cmdyVcgRatio
property.meta: Assumed vertical center of gravity as a ration of container height

property.name: cmdyVentPct
property.meta: Recommended vent setting for this commodity

property.name: cmdyIsArchetype
property.meta: TRUE if set this Commodity can be a supertype (archetype).

many-to-one.name: cmdyArchetype
many-to-one.meta: archetype for this type: refers to another member of this class. If points to self, this is its own archetype.

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.RoutingPoint
class.meta: Domain entity representing Routing points associated with UnLocCode and itself

many-to-one.name: pointActualPOD
many-to-one.meta: rp to the Actual rp Of Discharge

property.name: pointIsPlaceholderPoint
property.meta: True if this RoutingPoint acts as a place holder

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.CarrierService
class.meta: Domain entity representing a service for a carrier, like 'Union Pacific East'

property.name: srvcName
property.meta: Name of the service, like "Pacific South Express"

property.name: srvcCarrierMode
property.meta: The mode of carriers on this service (vessel, rail, or barge)

many-to-one.name: srvcItinerary
many-to-one.meta: The offical itinerary of carriers on this service

property.name: srvcPkey
property.meta: The SPARCS Service pkey, if imported from SPARCS.

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.CarrierItinerary
class.meta: Represents the itinerary of a carrier as a list of Routing Points it will visit

property.name: itinId
property.meta: Name for this itinerary (does not have to be unique)

many-to-one.name: itinOwnerCv
many-to-one.meta: Owner CarrierVisit, IFF this is a deviant itinerary, else null

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.PointCall
class.meta: Represents a 'call' of a carrier at a Routing Point

many-to-one.name: callItinerary
many-to-one.meta: The Itinerary to which this Call belongs

property.name: callNumber
property.meta: 1=first call to a point, 2=second call to a point, etc.

property.name: callScanCode
property.meta: One character code for SPARCS 'scan plan'

property.name: callTransitTimeMin
property.meta: Typical transit time in hours to next point

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.Destination
class.meta: A destination served by a carrier

many-to-one.name: destCall
many-to-one.meta: The CarrierCall where Units for this Destination are discharged from the carrier

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.MasterBizUnit
class.meta: A functional subset of an Organization with a single role.

property.name: bizuId
property.meta: business unit id/code: a unique natural key familiar to end users (APL, NYK, ...)

property.name: bizuName
property.meta: The Long Name of the Busines Unit (eg:American president Lines)

property.name: bizuRole
property.meta: Role of this business unit: line operator, agent, etc.

property.name: bizuIsEqOwner
property.meta: True if this MasterBizUnit owns Equipment

property.name: bizuIsEqOperator
property.meta: True if this MasterBizUnit operates Equipment

many-to-one.name: bizuOrg

property.name: ctctAddressLine1

property.name: ctctWebSiteURL

property.name: ctctFtpAddress

property.name: bzuIsEqOwner

property.name: bzuIsEqOperator

property.name: bzuCreditStatus

property.name: bzuPerUnitGuaranteeLimit

property.name: ctctAddressLine1
property.meta: Address where Biz Unit is located

property.meta: Address where Biz Unit is located

property.name: ctctAddressLine3
property.meta: Address where Biz Unit is located

property.name: ctctCity
property.meta: The city where this biz unit is located

many-to-one.name: ctctState
many-to-one.meta: The state where this biz unit is located

many-to-one.name: ctctCountry
many-to-one.meta: The Country where Biz Unit is located

property.name: ctctMailCode
property.meta: The mail code where this biz unit is located

property.name: ctctTel

property.name: ctctFax

property.name: ctctEmailAddress

property.name: ctctWebSiteURL

property.name: ctctFtpAddress

property.name: eqgrdIsPersist
property.meta: Whether the EquipmentGrade persists or not

property.name: grpTimeStartDelivery
property.meta: Start time when delivery of units assigned to this Group can be started from their current facility.

property.name: grpTimeEndDelivery
property.meta: End time when delivery of units assigned to this Group can no longer be done from their current facility.

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.EquipDamageType
class.meta: Domain entity representing equipment damage type: holed, burned, etc

property.name: eqdmgtypEqClass
property.meta: Equipment Class for this Damage Type

class.meta: Domain entity representing an equipment component: door, floor, etc

property.name: eqcmpEqClass
property.meta: Equipment Class for this Damage Loc

property.name: eqsrlrngRegex
property.meta: Regular expression identifying the container numbers

property.name: eqsrlrngTareWeightKg
property.meta: The default tare weight for this class (to be overridden by Equipment instance)

property.name: eqsrlrngSafeWeightKg
property.meta: The default safe weight for this class (to be overridden by Equipment instance)

property.name: eqsrlrngEqtypeId

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.AgentRepresentation
class.meta: Entity to define relationship between the agent and the ScopedBizUnit entity

many-to-one.name: agentrepScopedBusinessUnit
many-to-one.meta: Scoped Biz Unit entity for this representation

property.name: agentrepStartDate
property.meta: Date when the representation of the scoped biz unit entity by this agent starts

property.name: agentrepEndDate
property.meta: Date when the representation of the scoped biz unit entity by this agent ends

property.name: lineopDOTHazCarrierCertNbr
property.meta: The Hazardous Materials Carrier Cert Number issued by the department of transportation.

property.name: lineopBkgUnique
property.meta: Booking numbers are not re-used, otherwise re-used from vessel to vessel

property.name: lineopStopBkgUpdates
property.meta: Stop all booking updates to unit after loadlist

property.name: lineopStopRtgUpdates
property.meta: Stop all routing updates for unit after loadlist

property.name: lineopBlUnique
property.meta: BL numbers are not re-used, otherwise re-used from vessel to vessel

property.name: lineopBkgUsage
property.meta: Bookings are required, optional or not used by line operator

property.name: lineopBkgRoll
property.meta: Action taken on containers if a booking is rolled (routed to another vessel)

property.name: lineopBkgRollCutoff
property.meta: Vessel cutoff validations for booking roll feature

property.name: lineopBkgAdhoc
property.meta: Line operator bookings are created ADHOC from gate clerk input

property.name: lineopBkgIsNotValidated
property.meta: Line operator bookings are not accurate enough to support gate rule validation

property.name: lineopRollLateCtr
property.meta: Roll late container to next vessel visit for service

many-to-one.name: lineopDemurrageRules
many-to-one.meta: Top node in a EntityMappingPredicate tree defining the dumurrage rules for this line

many-to-one.name: lineopPowerRules
many-to-one.meta: Top node in a EntityMappingPredicate tree defining the power rules for this line

many-to-one.name: lineopLineDemurrageRules
many-to-one.meta: Top node in a EntityMappingPredicate tree defining the line dumurrage rules for this line

property.name: lineopGenPinNbr
property.meta: Generate PIN Number for units belonging to the line operator

property.name: lineopUsePinNbr
property.meta: Use PIN Number for units belonging to the line operator

property.name: lineopOrderItemNotUnique
property.meta: Order items are not Unique. Can also be null

property.name: lineopIsOrderNbrUnique
property.meta: Order numbers are not re-used and unique across all orders(Eg. Booking, EDO etc)

property.name: lineopReeferTimeMonitor1
property.meta: 1st default monitoring time for all live reefers belonging to this line operator

property.name: lineopReeferTimeMonitor2
property.meta: 2nd default monitoring time for all live reefers belonging to this line operator

property.name: lineopReeferTimeMonitor3
property.meta: 3rd default monitoring time for all live reefers belonging to this line operator

property.name: lineopReeferTimeMonitor4
property.meta: 4th default monitoring time for all live reefers belonging to this line operator

property.name: lineopReeferOffPowerTimeLimit
property.meta: Number of minutes reefers belonging to this line operator can be unplugged

property.name: lineopPropagateReeferChanges
property.meta: Determines if any changes made to lines default monitor times are automatically propagated to reefer units owned by line

property.name: eqcondIsPersist
property.meta: Whether the EquipmentCondition persists or not

property.name: mnrstatEqClass
property.meta: Equipment Class for this M&R Status

property.name: mnrstatIsPersist
property.meta: Whether the M&R Status persists or not

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.OrderPurpose
class.meta: Domain entity representing system and user definable order purpose

property.name: orderpurposeId
property.meta: The id of the order purpose

property.name: orderpurposeIsBuiltInEvent
property.meta: True if this is a built-in order purpose

many-to-one.name: snxmlbxFacility
many-to-one.meta: Mailboxes are set up by facility.

property.name: snxmlbxCommType
property.meta: Communication Type used for this SNX Mailbox

property.name: snxmlbxCommAddr
property.meta: Communication Address (IP/email) used for this SNX Mailbox

property.name: snxmlbxCommUserId
property.meta: Communication User ID for this SNX Mailbox

property.name: snxmlbxCommPasswd
property.meta: Communication Password for this SNX Mailbox

property.name: snxmlbxCommFolder
property.meta: Communication Folder for this SNX Mailbox

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.reference.CraneDelayType
class.meta: Domain entity representing custom crane delays
